# Zi Designs Website - Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js website for Zi Designs, a creative-tech studio led by Musinguzi Simon Peter.

## Project Overview
- **Frontend**: Next.js 15 with TypeScript and App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom color scheme (mint aqua & charcoal palette)
- **Features**: Dark/Light theme toggle, responsive design, modern UI/UX
- **Deployment**: Designed for Vercel deployment

## Design Guidelines
- Use a stencil-style logo font for the brand name "ZI DESIGNS"
- Clean sans-serif body font for readability
- Mint aqua (#40E0D0) and charcoal (#36454F) color palette
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Smooth animations and micro-interactions

## Key Sections
1. Navigation with logo, menu links, and theme toggle
2. Hero section with bold statement and CTAs
3. "What We Build" services section with icons
4. Design Lessons preview with cards
5. Portfolio & Templates showcase
6. Contact/Hire Us section with multiple contact options

## Component Structure
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Implement proper accessibility features
- Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
- Create reusable components for consistency
- Implement proper SEO meta tags

## Content Focus
The website showcases:
- Web development and design services
- AI tools and chatbot development
- UI/UX design expertise
- Educational content and mentorship
- Template and brand kit creation
